pkgmetadata.longdescription: # airflow-add-onsAirflow utilities to extend Airflow operators and connectors## Where to get itThe source code is currently hosted on GitHub at:https://github.com/pualien/airflow-add-onsBinary installers for the latest released version are available at the [Pythonpackage index](https://pypi.org/project/airflow-add-ons/).```shpip install airflow-add-ons```
